bug.author: williamfzc
bug.summary: WARNING:tensorflow:Your input ran out of data; interrupting training.
bug.description: Make sure t hat your dataset or generator can generate at least steps_per_epoch * epochs batches (in this case, 30 batches). You may need to use the repeat() function when b uilding your dataset.
